title: How can I migrate contract which inherits RefundableCrowdsale?

body: Hi @fjchen7! Please take a look at the [SampleCrowdsale](https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/zeppelin-solidity/blob/master/contracts/examples/SampleCrowdsale.sol#L34-L37) example. Notice how all the parent constructors are called. It's not that `RefundableCrowdsale` _overrides_ the `Crowdsale` constructor with less arguments, but that it leaves the `Crowdsale` constructor uncalled so that you have to call it yourself. You should add: function GustavoCoinCrowdsale(__...__, uint256 _goal) __Crowdsale(...)__ RefundableCrowdsale(_goal) {} Let me know if it's clear!

Hi, @frangio
I got it. Thank you!
